|phoenix_title|  **wx.DCFontChanger**
==========================================================================================================================================

:ref:`wx.DCFontChanger`  is a small helper class for setting a font on a :ref:`wx.DC`  and unsetting it automatically in the destructor, restoring the previous one.          







         



.. versionadded:: 2.9.0

   .. method:: Set(self, font)

      Set the font to use.                  

      This method is meant to be called once only and only on the objects created with the constructor overload not taking :ref:`wx.Font`  argument and has the same effect as the other constructor, i.e. sets the font to the given `font`  and ensures that the old value is restored when this object is destroyed.
